value.stringValue: This project has a matte lamination cover finish. If the cover art is mostly a solid color, let the customer know that matte shows scuffs more easily than gloss and recommend anti-scratch lamination as an alternative.
Customer has approved Electronic Proof. Now upload Production File, set type, mark "Approved for Production"
This order is ready for hardcopy proofing. Upload production file, set production status to "Ready for Hardcopy Proofing"
Proof rejected, confirm issues with customer
This hardcover book is under 60 pages and uses a thin paper stock. Let customer know the paper won't be as durable as 105lb paper since the binding will be done by hand.

This order is using heavy matte paper. Double check the artwork to see if there are heavy-coverage pages facing blank or light-coverage pages. If there are, suggest adding matte varnish, otherwise the light pages will be smudged, there's no avoiding it.
